Activity: Log in, check emails. Respond to urgent inquiries and flag important but non-urgent ones for later.
Continue root cause analysis for the third identified data quality issue (e.g., missing insurance information). Interview relevant staff (e.g., Medical Records Specialist, Help Desk Support).
Document the interview findings, update the list of potential causes, and refine the hypotheses.
Start testing hypotheses related to the third data quality issue. Review data entry workflows, system configurations, and training materials.
Analyze test results and determine if the hypotheses are supported by the data. Document the findings and conclusions.
Based on the findings, identify the root cause(s) for the third data quality issue. Document the root cause(s) and provide supporting evidence.
Develop recommendations to address the root cause(s) for the third data quality issue.
Categorize the root cause(s) identified for the third data quality issue into the existing list of common themes. Update the list as needed.
Review all documentation and prepare a summary report of the week's activities, including the root cause analysis findings, recommendations, and common themes. Send to @itpm-1.
